verbose_text: Synaptic LPA is modulated by the plasticity related gene 1 (PRG-1) [XREF_BIBR], which is expressed at the postsynaptic density of excitatory synapses on cortical and hippocampal glutamatergic neurons and plays an important role in maintaining synaptic homeostasis [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: LPA is modulated by the plasticity-related gene 1
